page.title: 19COMMENTS BY LOCAL PEOPLE
page.content:
"A very pleasant and charming area, with beautiful walks, lovely country- side and friendly people."
"Some members of our family have lived here for several generations."
"Superb villages in delightful surroundings. The removal of colliery waste and restoration of their areas has been superbly done. Vandalism is very rare and then due to incomers."
"A most interesting place to live and an area obviously ripe for development as can be seen from the burgeoning private development of Prior's Grange, and the possibility of an 'up-market' hotel being created out of the manor house. This is obviously the up and coming place to live, full of history with a landscape unmatched in Durham."
